A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m all for subverting expectations. Game of Thrones did it all the time. The difference is\, their subversions usually made sense. This film is filled with spite and resistance of the wrong kind. The toxic fans are one thing\, but there are legitimate issues with how Luke and our new trio of heroes expand their stories in this film. Especially the utter lack of respect for Luke and who he’s grown to be. I think Rian is a fine director\, but thumbing the eyes of fans who have followed a story for 40+ years shows very little admiration or respect for the material you’ve been given the honor to be a part of.
